ygData.subject: Re: mana
ygData.msgSnippet: Want to find out what items will do you the most good? http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest is the EQ enchanters page, one link of note on this page is the
ygData.messageBody:
Want to find out what items will do you the most good?

http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest is the EQ enchanters page, one link of
note on this page is the "mana calculator" on the left nav bar. For
instance, my lvl 26 DE Necro with a base intel of 134, enhanced to 156 with
items gains an extra 115 mana from these +int items, for a grand total of
863.


>
> At the moment you put it on it gives it take it off it takes it away ...
my
> estimate is +2 earings dont really give as much mana increase untill lvl
34
> before then maybe mana items better , but im guessing.
> Im loaded now with 160 modified intel and skull and book for an extra 60
> mana at lvl 30.
